import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent { username:any constructor(private route:Router,private userService:UserService){ } onLogout(){ localStorage.clear(); this.route.navigateByUrl(""); } }
